title: The New Carthage
author: VD
content_html: The Founding Fathers believed they were building the New Rome. But the Phoenician Navy has transformed the United States of Not-America into the New Carthage. DISCUSS ON SG
content_text:
The Founding Fathers believed they were building the New Rome. But the Phoenician Navy has transformed the United States of Not-America into the New Carthage.
DISCUSS ON SG
